pullrequest.title: Initial layout for being able to execute transport command line commands with `ign`.

content.raw: When running `ign topic list` or `ign service list` we have to create a new node that listens advertise messages during some time, and then, prints the topic names. The longer the `advertiseInterval`, the longer we will have to wait for advertise messages. Of course, if we set the value too low, we will flood the network with control messages. I thought 500ms. would be a good compromise.
content.html: When running ign topic list or ign service list we have to create a new node that listens advertise messages during some time, and then, prints the topic names. The longer the advertiseInterval, the longer we will have to wait for advertise messages. Of course, if we set the value too low, we will flood the network with control messages. I thought 500ms. would be a good compromise.
